sentences.sentence: And in a flash, the whole pub is filles with quacking birds.
sentences.translation: 一阵闪光，整个酒吧里顿时填满了嘎嘎叫着的家禽。

sentences.sentence: He lives in the Marais, Rue des Filles-du-Calvaire, with his grandfather. I do not recollect his name.
sentences.translation: 他住在沼泽区受难修女街，他的外祖父家里……我不记得他外祖父的名字了。

sentences.sentence: That evening, at the usual hour, Jean Valjean came to the Rue des Filles-du-Calvaire.--"Madame went out with Monsieur and has not yet returned," Basque said to him.
sentences.translation: 晚上，在惯常的时刻，冉阿让来到受难修女街。 “夫人和先生一同出去了，还没有回来。”
